quote_first: It was 1.12 a.m. when Father arrived at the police station. I did not see him until
quote_last:
but I knew he was there because I could hear him.
He was shouting, “I want to see my son,” and “Why the hell is he locked up?” and, “Of course I’m bloody angry.”
title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time
author: Mark Haddon
